00008 long PolygramCounter::count(const Polygram& P) const {
00009   if (counter.count(P) == 0) return 0;
00010   map<Polygram,long>::const_iterator mi;
00011   mi = counter.find(P);
00012   return (*mi).second;
00013 }

00016 void PolygramCounter::process(const string& word) {
00017   if (int(word.size()) < n) return;
00018   for (unsigned k=0; k<word.size()-n; k++) {
00019     Polygram P(word.substr(k,n));
00020     if (P.size() < n) continue;
00021     if (counter.count(P) == 0) {
00022       counter[P] = 1;
00023       total++;
00024     }
00025     else {
00026       counter[P]++;
00027       total++;
00028     }
00029   }
00030 }
00031 
00032 void PolygramCounter::report(int ntop) const {
00033   set<pair<double,Polygram> > freq2poly;
00034   map<Polygram,long>::const_iterator ci;
00035 
00036   for (ci=counter.begin(); ci!=counter.end(); ++ci) {
00037     Polygram P = (*ci).first;
00038     double f = -frequency(P);
00039     freq2poly.insert( make_pair(f,P) );
00040   }
00041 
00042   
00043   set<pair<double,Polygram> >::iterator si;
00044   int k = 0;
00045   for (si = freq2poly.begin(); k<ntop && si!=freq2poly.end(); ++si, ++k) {
00046     Polygram P = (*si).second;
00047     double f = -(*si).first;
00048     cout << P << "\t" << 100*f << endl;
00049   }
00050 }
